about.summary: The 'mlr3' package family is a set of packages for machine-learning purposes built in a modular fashion. This wrapper package is aimed to simplify the installation and loading of the core 'mlr3' packages. Get more information about the 'mlr3' project at <https://mlr3book.mlr-org.com/>.

The 'mlr3' package family is a set of packages for machine-learning purposes built in a modular fashion. This wrapper package is aimed to simplify the installation and loading of the core 'mlr3' packages. Get more information about the 'mlr3' project at <https://mlr3book.mlr-org.com/>.

name: r-mlr3verse
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.3' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mlr3verse
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/mlr3verse_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/mlr3verse/mlr3verse_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 81950b5bdd93cb6fd028fc029de42aa1ff1c3291b9f52c83f3bef11e32737f41

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mlr3
    - r-mlr3data
    - r-mlr3filters
    - r-mlr3learners
    - r-mlr3misc
    - r-mlr3pipelines
    - r-mlr3tuning
    - r-mlr3viz
    - r-paradox
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mlr3
    - r-mlr3data
    - r-mlr3filters
    - r-mlr3learners
    - r-mlr3misc
    - r-mlr3pipelines
    - r-mlr3tuning
    - r-mlr3viz
    - r-paradox

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('mlr3verse')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('mlr3verse')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://mlr3verse.mlr-org.com, https://github.com/mlr-org/mlr3verse
  license: LGPL-3.0-only
  summary: The 'mlr3' package family is a set of packages for machine-learning purposes built
    in a modular fashion. This wrapper package is aimed to simplify the installation
    and loading of the core 'mlr3' packages. Get more information about the 'mlr3' project
    at <https://mlr3book.mlr-org.com/>.
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/LGPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - pascal-git

# Package: mlr3verse
# Title: Easily Install and Load the 'mlr3' Package Family
# Version: 0.1.3
# Authors@R: c(person(given = "Patrick", family = "Schratz", role = c("cre", "aut"), email = "patrick.schratz@gmail.com", comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0003-0748-6624")), person(given = "Michel", family = "Lang", role = "aut", email = "michellang@gmail.com", comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0001-9754-0393")))
# Description: The 'mlr3' package family is a set of packages for machine-learning purposes built in a modular fashion. This wrapper package is aimed to simplify the installation and loading of the core 'mlr3' packages. Get more information about the 'mlr3' project at <https://mlr3book.mlr-org.com/>.
# License: LGPL-3
# URL: https://mlr3verse.mlr-org.com, https://github.com/mlr-org/mlr3verse
# BugReports: https://github.com/mlr-org/mlr3verse/issues
# Depends: mlr3, mlr3filters, mlr3learners, mlr3pipelines, mlr3tuning, mlr3viz, paradox, R (>= 3.1.0)
# Imports: mlr3data, mlr3misc
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 7.1.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-07-02 19:54:05 UTC; pjs
# Author: Patrick Schratz [cre, aut] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0003-0748-6624>), Michel Lang [aut] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0001-9754-0393>)
# Maintainer: Patrick Schratz <patrick.schratz@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-07-06 12:00:06 UTC
